title: Champion Select Lvl 4/5 Borders!?
body:
Wouldn't it be nice if the champ selection screen shows which champ you got on lvl 4/5? It would help those people expanding on champ pools greatly. Sure you can list them down but wouldn't it be easier to know on the spot instead of shifting vision now and then? save those seconds maybe? what do you guys think?

PS: Can't wait for the {{champion:83}}  update! Yaaaay!

replies.body:
It would be so awesome!!! I would love to expand my champ pool! It would come in handy when I'm studying the champ in bot games or norms or something!!

No news on on {{champion:83}} update sorry {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
I dislike that simply getting a win gives you about 4x the mastery points, making how well you play the champion itself a little invalid

It is just a method to get you hooked a bit longer, soon enough everyone will hit full mastery on a very large pool of champs and you can tell they are actually not masters of most of them.

However I suspect the reasoning behind this is so people play a variety of champions so they are not toxic and hard to carry in ranked (because people just play one champ even if the opposing team picks a counter). Ergo league is more of an investive (not a word but it should be) experience to try new things and have a general understand of multiple champions and roles so you don't get surprised when you don't know their abilities ect ( you can't actually outplay anyone if you don't know what they can throw at you and the availability of that damage/cc. This also applies to profitable itemization).
